title: svAminAthEna samrakSitOham
sahitya:
svAminAthEna samrakSitOham saccidAnanda nAthAtmanA shrI 


anupallavi

  sOma tAtEna vallI dEvasEnOpEta vara guruguhEna 


caraNam    praNavArttha tatvOpadEshEna maNi mantrauSadha prada nipuNEna
sanakAdi sannuta prabhAvEna dinakara shashi tEjah prakAshEna
(madhyama kAla)
mANikya makuTa kuNDala shObhita marakata maNimaya vajrAyudhEna
nava nandanAdyupAsita sharavaNa mantra svarUpENa varENa shrI
